sentences.en: A third of the Senate and the entire House are up for re-election.
sentences.cn: 参议院三分之一的席位和众议院所有席位都面临改选。

sentences.en: After 10 years of negotiation, the Senate ratified the strategic arms reduction treaty.
sentences.cn: 经过10年协商，参议院已经正式批准了《削减战略武器条约》。

sentences.en: Despite objections by the White House, the Senate voted today to cut off aid.
sentences.cn: 参议院不顾白宫的反对于今天投票决定中止援助。

sentences.en: In the Senate, the count is too close to call at this point.
sentences.cn: 参议院现在的票数还难分上下。

sentences.en: Some members of the House and Senate worked all day yesterday.
sentences.cn: 一些众议员和参议员昨天工作了整整一天。

sentences.en: The child-care bill is to be tacked on to the budget plan now being worked out in the Senate.
sentences.cn: 儿童保育款项将被追加到参议院正在审议的预算方案中。

sentences.en: The president vetoed the bill, and the Senate failed by a single vote to override his veto.
sentences.cn: 总统否决了该议案，而参议院以一票之差未能推翻他的否决。

sentences.en: The proposal was approved by both the House and the Senate.
sentences.cn: 那项提案在众议院和参议院均获通过.
参议院批准了这项议案。

sentences.en: The senate had a session today with closed doors.
sentences.cn: 参议院今天召开一次秘密会议.

sentences.en: The Senate is expected to pass the bill shortly.
sentences.cn: 预计参议院不久就会通过此议案。

sentences.en: The Senate shall have the sole Power to try all Impeachments.
sentences.cn: 参议院独自拥有审理一切弹劾案的全权.

sentences.en: These businessmen have been lobbying a bill through the Senate.
sentences.cn: 这些商人一直在游说议员通过该项议案.

sentences.en: They feel deeply the honour of belonging to the Senate.
sentences.cn: 他们为作为参议院的成员而深感荣幸.

sentences.en: This is the fifth and probably final day of testimony before the Senate Judiciary Committee.
sentences.cn: 今天是在参议院司法委员会作证的第5天，很可能也是最后一天。

words.tran_cn: 参议员；（古罗马的）元老院议员；评议员，理事
参议院，上院；（古罗马的）元老院

phrases.tran_cn: 参议院军事委员会；参议院武装部队委员会
n. 美国参议院预算委员会

trans.tran_cn: 参议院（美国、法国、澳大利亚等国家的两个立法机构之一），上院，某些国家的)大学理事会，大学评议会
trans.tran_en: the smaller and more important of the two parts of the government with the power to make laws, in countries such as the US, Australia, and France
